award_title: CAREER: Transforming Ion Mobility Spectrometry-Mass Spectrometry-Based Isotopic Shifts Across Molecular Classes for Isomer Identification
subject: Reducing friction around shared workflows
body:
Hi Professor Nagy,

I know ion mobility spectrometry-mass spectrometry work involves a lot of moving partsâ€”scripts for analyzing isotopic shifts, derivatization protocols, data from interlaboratory validations. That often means fielding emails asking "where's that notebook?" or digging up old code for collaborators.

Ouro helps turn computational workflows, datasets, and notebooks into reusable building blocks that others in your field can actually plug into their work. It's a way to consolidate what you're already doing into something more durable and accessible.

With winter break coming up, wanted to reach out before things get hectic. Happy to get your group a look if it's helpful.

Happy holidays,

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
